news.title: Mysterious sharp symmetric features detected around young double star
news.summary: Home Astronomy & Space Astronomy December 17, 2015 December 17, 2015 by Tomasz Nowakowski report (Phys.org)—An international team of astronomers, led by Markus Janson of Stockholm University in Sweden, has discovered mysterious sharp symmetric…
